content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or sexual acts ,General Mature Content, violence, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, BDSM.
All characters are over the age of 20.

name: Female Anchor Next Door Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Have you ever longed for a glimmer of sexual fantasy in your boring working life...like, a porn streamer you followed unexpectedly barging into your life? Discovering the secret of a female athlete in the gym? The yandere behavior of your juniors in the workplace? Or even...a magical girl coming to me?
